thread.title: French store faces fine over Nutella sales brawls

title: French store faces fine over Nutella sales brawls
text:
French store faces fine over Nutella sales brawls 4:56pm GMT - 01:03 
French supermarket chain Intermarche could be fined after competition investigators found it breached rules with its hefty discounts on products such as the Nutella chocolate spread offer that caused pandemonium in some stores last month.   
French supermarket chain Intermarche could be fined after competition investigators found it breached rules with its hefty discounts on products such as the Nutella chocolate spread offer that caused pandemonium in some stores last month.  //reut.rs/2CDYw5I
